sentences: Conan Christopher O'Brien (born April 18, 1963) is an American television host, comedian, writer, podcaster, and producer.

He is best known for having hosted late-night talk shows for almost 28 years, beginning with Late Night with Conan O'Brien (1993–2009) and The Tonight Show with Conan O'Brien (2009–2010) on the NBC television network, and Conan (2010–2021) on the cable channel TBS.

Starting in September 2006, O'Brien was stalked by Father David Ajemian of the Archdiocese of Boston, who, despite multiple warnings to stop, sent O'Brien letters signed as "your priest stalker".
Ajemian later sent O'Brien death threats and tried to forcefully enter a taping of Late Night before being arrested.
On April 8, 2008, Ajemian pleaded guilty to stalking, and was later laicized.
